Fall Session!

The fall semester is focused on having students stay on track with their classes. Tutors will be working with a small group of students to reinforce their learning in the respective subject, giving students a solid school year.

Fall Session!

The fall semester is focused on having students stay on track with their classes. Tutors will be working with a small group of students to reinforce their learning in the respective subject, giving students a solid school year.

Join us!

Our Origin and Mission

  • April 2020
    As students who witnessed the loss of learning in online classes due to the pandemic, we recognized the need to close the learning gap. Online learning in a class setting has its challenges as teachers reduce their curriculums, and it becomes hard to gauge students' understanding.
  • August 2020
    Our solution was to help students stay academically engaged through tutoring in small class settings. We began helping students grades 3-8 stay academically engaged in Math and English by providing free online tutoring during the unprecedented pandemic. As schools are forced to continue online in the fall, we decided to extend our summer program for the remainder of the year.
  • August 2021
    However, we did not stop there. As we got more experienced, we noticed that students were still struggling and tutoring was crucial to help them catch up. Because of that, we're still here today.
  • Present
    Currently, our goal during the Fall and Spring semesters are to to help students stay on pace, reinforce concepts, and possibly even learn ahead. Our summers are dedicated to preparing students for their future school year and make sure they have a smooth-sailing year.

Parent Reviews

See what parents have to say about our program.

A Parent from the Fall

"Our tutor responds quick to any questions I as a parent may have. She is assertive and has great power point slides that provide sample math questions which make it fun and help my child feel engaged. Our tutor goes above and beyond and I'm happy that we are aligned on the same goals for my student!"

Parent from the Spring

"My child is able to excel in math and get more practice with our tutor when she's unclear on topics from school."

A Parent from the Summer

"My daughter had a great time interacting with her teacher. My daughter felt that it was challenging yet fun at the same time. This practice over the summer has really helped her feel more confident entering her fall school year."

Fall Session!

The fall semester is focused on having students stay on track with their classes. Tutors will be working with a small group of students to reinforce their learning in the respective subject, giving students a solid school year.
